name: Rowdy The Head Hunter (mac version)
description: Rowdy The Head Hunter is a 3rd Person Shooter with a wild west theme. The player is Rowdy a bounty hunter who is looking to fill his bounties. Play through 4 bounties, each with unique boss fights. Each boss controls their own type of enemies trying to keep Rowdy from reaching them and collecting his bounty. Use Rowdy's hypnotize ability to stop enemies in their tracks and take advantage of the in game store. Pause the game and shop for upgrade on the spot. Need a speed boost, assault rifle, or a health refill. No problem just pause and shop on your way to collect that bounty.
